author: sroychow
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds UL2016 (pre and post) scale and smearing corrections from e/gamma in miniAOD and nanoAOD. In addition, as discussed before with the xpog, it adds the most important 4 systematics/object for scale and smearing corrections to the electron and photon tables. This depends on this [PR](https://github.com/cms-data/EgammaAnalysis-ElectronTools/pull/11) where the correction files are added.

#### PR validation:
Checked the following wfs - 
136.7722, 1325.81, 136.8523, 136.7952

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
Backport is needed for remini + nano V9(10_6_X). Will be followed up in a separate PR.

CC 
 @jainshilpi
title: EGamma: systematics + UL2016 scale and smearing corrections
